description: Documentation for 9.7.16.3.1. Leading Dimension Stride: relative offset or absolute address

directories.name: 9716312_absolute_address_mode_for_k_dimension_being_48b
directories.description: The `tcgen05.mma` instruction with *K-dimension* of 48B would overflow the 128B shared memory boundary if the data is packed contiguously.

files.title: Overview
files.summary: There are two modes of Leading Dimension Strides as described below. Bit #52 in the [Shared memory descriptor](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tcgen05-shared-memory-descriptor) is used to distinguish between two modes.
